title: Language Learning Simulation Development for Elementary Students Through Online Learning Space Design

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental digital device usage skills and basic understanding of language learning
context.additional_context: A language education program for elementary students conducted by a university-affiliated educational institution, focusing on developing interactive and spatial utilization skills in a virtual reality-based learning environment.

learning_goals: Learners can utilize situational language expressions with over 80% accuracy in VR environments
Learners experience completing language projects with peers at least three times through online collaboration tools
Learners generate at least two personalized learning paths in accordance with digital learning space design principles
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
